explanation: The stage direction describes the character pulling a half-circle from his pocket and aiming it at a cane, which indicates an interaction with an object. This fits the definition of the 'object' category, which involves describing or interacting with objects.
stgdir: Il tire de sa poche un demi Cercle, et le braque sur une canne qu'il tient à la main, et qui sert d'appui.
